pages.title: Play Dead
pages.text: $(bold)Play Dead$() is another trick nearly all rocks know.$(br2)In the wild, it is commonly used as a means of escaping predators, but for them to perform this trick on command command will require you to associate the words with their natural survival instincts.$(br2)You can teach your Pet Rockâ„¢ this trick by throwing them

into lava, onto a cactus or into fire and saying 'Play Dead' in a loud clear voice.$(br2)While this may seem cruel, rest assured that they will not be harmed, but will instead immediately play dead briefly before finding a nearby hiding place.$(br2)Should you be unable to find your rock after they hide, do not worry, simply stay near where they vanished and call their name until they return.
